name: fusion_inspector_v1.0.0(2.3.1)
title: FusionInspector_v1.0.0
summary: Identify fusions using known 'rescue list' fusion pairs, plus predictions from tools

inputSpec.name: fi_docker
inputSpec.label: fi_docker
inputSpec.help: File ID of FusionInspector Docker image in DNA Nexus

inputSpec.name: r1_fastqs
inputSpec.label: Read 1 fastq files
inputSpec.help: R1 FASTQ file(s) for a single sample

inputSpec.name: r2_fastqs
inputSpec.label: Read 2 fastq files
inputSpec.help: R2 FASTQ file(s) for a single sample

inputSpec.name: known_fusions
inputSpec.label: known_fusions
inputSpec.help: Any number of .txt files of known fusions which should be searched for. First column must be in format 'geneA--geneB'. Additional columns should be tab-delimited and are not used by the app.

inputSpec.name: genome_lib
inputSpec.label: genome_lib
inputSpec.help: A CTAT genome library, which is a reference file bundle required by Trinity CTAT tools

inputSpec.name: include_trinity
inputSpec.label: include_trinity
inputSpec.help: Set to 'true' to run Trinity de novo reconstruction of fusion transcripts from reads, or 'false' to skip this analysis

outputSpec.name: fi_trinity_fasta
outputSpec.label: fi_trinity_fasta
outputSpec.help: FASTA file of de novo assembled transcript sequences - generated if Trinity option is run

outputSpec.name: fi_trinity_gff
outputSpec.label: fi_trinity_gff
outputSpec.help: GFF3 file of reconstructed fusion transcript alignments - generated if Trinity option is run

outputSpec.name: fi_trinity_bed
outputSpec.label: fi_trinity_bed
outputSpec.help: BED file of reconstructed fusion transcript alignments - generated if Trinity option is run
